formattedAddress: 181 Clinton St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 181 Clinton St, New York, NY 10002-5550, USA

originalText.text: Pork fried rice bland lacking a lot of flavor and taste. Egg roll same thing. For $15.50 it was not at all worth it. Delivery guy rude very unprofessional and so ungrateful because he didn’t like MY $4.00 dollar tip walked away mumbling something underneath his breath. He should be thankful and happy that some people still do tip? If he was expecting a $5.00 tip he was mistaken. Tips are earned when someone gives a service that is professional he showed non of that. This will be my last time ordering food from this establishment not because of the people who run it or the delivery person because of the FOOD!

originalText.text: I’ve never been in the restaurant. But may may? My husband and I love the service. The food is great. And when we order out may may makes sure that people get their food fast. And we don’t mind tipping at all especially when we have the money. But when we don’t have extra money to give them a tip, we love the fact that they don’t complain.

originalText.text: The delivery people is disrespectful in a economy like this your tip is not going to be as you want it, and they complain as if they don’t get paid for their job very tasteless. If you gonna charge people these high prices break it down with the staff as well because they out here begging with an attitude. But the food is decent love my wings every time its just the disrespectful delivery person the have bringing the food

originalText.text: !!!!!!!!ROACHES ROACHES ROACHES ROACHES !!!!!!!! This restaurant is infested with roaches. I ordered Chicken & Broccoli with white rice , Chicken wings and steamed dumplings on Tuesday 12/26/23 @ 5:50pm. I started with the chicken broccoli it was great!! NEXT: Steamed dumplings was opened up and a large cockroach ran out of the dumpling bowl container. I am horrified !!!!! I gave this place a second chance after having bad service prior and they failed!!! They keep their precooked chicken wings on a half pan on the floor!! That should’ve told me right there to not eat anything from here !!!! I promise on all that’s holy , I have contacted the D.O.H. (Department of Health). I hope to heavens they get inspected for violations and unsanitary conditions. How can You guys ( May May) treat the community like this after we all supported May May for decades !!!!

originalText.text: No complaints on the quality of the food, but if you can’t afford to tip over 5 dollars don’t order from here they hire bums to deliver your food disrespectful bums. Anytime I tip its from 3 to 5 dollars mind you my order only be around 15 dollars maybe 20 at times, the bum delivery person always have an attitude with the tip bad for business and seems like a common complaint in these reviews. And to the owner of the restaurant times get a little rough hense your bum delivery people always begging!!! sometimes we are not gonna have a lot be grateful & may god bless you money hungry people
